trans-unit.source: Creates a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 建立多重選取的核取方塊群組，其可藉著繫結控制項至資料來源而動態地被建立。

trans-unit.source: In this topic:
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容：

trans-unit.target: [簡介](#Introduction)

trans-unit.source: [Specifying List Layout](#SpecifyingListLayout)
trans-unit.target: [指定清單版面配置](#SpecifyingListLayout)

trans-unit.source: [Specifying List Items](#SpecifyingListItems)
trans-unit.target: [指定清單項目](#SpecifyingListItems)

trans-unit.source: [Accessibility](#Accessibility)
trans-unit.target: [協助工具選項](#Accessibility)

trans-unit.target: [宣告式語法](#DeclarativeSyntax)

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 簡介

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control provides a multi selection check box group that can be dynamically generated with data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項提供多重選取核取方塊群組，其會以動態方式產生資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: It contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection with members corresponding to individual items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 它包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>含成員對應到清單中的個別項目集合。

trans-unit.source: To determine which items are checked, iterate through the collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷哪些項目會檢查，逐一查看的集合和測試<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>屬性清單中的每個項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also use multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control is easier for creating a set of check boxes using data binding, while the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> control gives you greater control over layout.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項是用於建立使用資料繫結，而個別的核取方塊的一組更容易<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控制項可讓您進一步控制配置。

trans-unit.source: Specifying List Layout
trans-unit.target: 指定清單版面配置

trans-unit.source: You can specify the way the list is displayed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定清單的方式使用顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For information about layout options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 版面配置選項的相關資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical`.
trans-unit.target: 依預設，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A> 會設為 `RepeatDirection.Vertical`。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` renders the list horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`水平呈現清單。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> settings do not allow horizontal layout.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>設定不允許水平配置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: Specifying List Items
trans-unit.target: 指定清單項目

trans-unit.source: To specify items that you want to appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control, place a `ListItem` element for each entry between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定您想要出現在項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制、 放置`ListItem`每個項目的開頭和結尾標記之間的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control also supports data binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項也支援資料繫結。

trans-unit.source: To bind the control to a data source, first create a data source, such as one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> objects, that contains the items to display in the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要將控制項繫結至資料來源，先建立資料來源，例如其中一個<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>物件，其中包含要在控制項中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: Next, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A> method to bind the data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.DataBind%2A>繫結至資料來源方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A> properties to specify which field in the data source to bind to the `Text` and `Value` properties of each list item in the control, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataTextField%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.DataValueField%2A>屬性，以指定的繫結至資料來源中欄位`Text`和`Value`屬性之每個清單項目在控制項中，分別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control will now display the information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項現在會顯示資料來源中的資訊。

trans-unit.source: To determine the selected items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control, iterate through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection and test the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property of each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷在選取的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項，逐一查看<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>收集和測試<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>屬性集合中每個項目。

trans-unit.source: This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: 此控制項可以用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之後，顯示應用程式中的任何資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用驗證控制項來驗證使用者輸入之前在控制項中顯示輸入的文字。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護標準控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)， [How to： 保護對指令碼會利用 Web 應用程式中藉由套用 HTML 編碼字串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[中驗證使用者輸入ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。

trans-unit.source: Accessibility
trans-unit.target: 協助工具選項

trans-unit.source: For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell with the height of the tallest cell and width of the widest cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的填補量加入四個邊的儲存格的最高的資料格的高度與中最寬的資料格的寬度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The resulting cell size is applied uniformly to all cells in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 產生的儲存格大小會一致地套用至所有資料格<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.FindControl%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.FindControl%2A> method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.FindControl%2A>方法覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>方法的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>類別。

trans-unit.source: You should not override this version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該覆寫這個版本的 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，指定清單控制項中項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the style of the specified item type at the specified index in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 在清單控制項的指定索引處，擷取指定項目類型的樣式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" />, indicating that style attributes are not set on individual list items in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="null" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項的個別清單項目上未設定任何樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.GetItemStyle%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.GetItemStyle%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The style attribute for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control applies to all list items that are contained by the control.
trans-unit.target: 樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項適用於所有清單項目包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> to examine or set the style attribute for the control and its list items.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>來檢查或設定用於控制項和其清單項目之樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a footer section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項是否包含頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain a footer section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含頁尾區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasFooter%2A> property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasFooter%2A>屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: Footers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 頁尾不是時，支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a heading section.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項是否包含標題區段。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain a heading section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含標題區段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasHeader%2A> property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasHeader%2A>屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: Headers are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 標頭不是時，支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control contains a separator between items in the list.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項是否在清單中的項目之間包含分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" />, indicating that a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> does not contain separators.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 不包含分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasSeparators%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.HasSeparators%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: Separators are not supported when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 分隔符號不是時，支援<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control, used to index the <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> specified in the <c>postCollection</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的索引鍵識別碼，用來為 <c>postCollection</c> 參數中指定的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> 製作索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains value information indexed by control identifiers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，包含使用控制識別項進行索引的值資訊。

trans-unit.source: Processes the posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項的張貼資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> is different from the last posting; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 的狀態與最後張貼的狀態不同，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates whether the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法會指出是否狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項已變更。

trans-unit.source: In other words, it determines whether each list item in the control has the same <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> value as the last posted value.
trans-unit.target: 換句話說，它會判斷是否在控制項中的每個清單項目具有相同的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>與最後張貼的值的值。

trans-unit.source: A user selecting or clearing an item in the control changes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A> property value for the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者選取或清除控制項變更中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem.Selected%2A>對應的屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItem>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the same list items are selected in the control, or if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> is disabled, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在控制項中，選取相同的清單項目或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>已停用，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method returns `true` for a control, the page framework invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method for the control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法會傳回`true`控制項，網頁架構會叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Configures the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control prior to rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端上呈現以前，先設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method allows derived classes to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法可讓衍生的類別處理<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A> method performs any necessary prerendering steps prior to saving view state and rendering content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender%2A>方法會執行任何預先呈現的必要步驟，在儲存檢視狀態和轉譯內容之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>。

trans-unit.source: The individual list items contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are initialized for rendering using the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的個別清單項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項初始化為使用目前的轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A> method in a custom server control so that it always returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle> class for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便一律會傳回的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableStyle>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.OnPreRender(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the ASP.NET application that the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知 ASP.NET 應用程式 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項的狀態已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The page framework calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method indicates that the state of the list items have changed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個網頁架構會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法表示已變更的清單項目狀態中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法，以引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A> method to perform custom processing when the user selects or clears list items in the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項開發人員可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.OnSelectedIndexChanged%2A>方法來執行自訂處理，當使用者選取或清除清單控制項中的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method can optionally perform validation before raising the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged> event for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>方法可以選擇性地執行之前引發驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged>控制項事件。

trans-unit.source: To validate a group of controls on the page when a list item within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> is selected, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A> properties to `true`, and specify the group of controls to validate in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證時清單內的項目頁面上的控制項群組的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>選取時，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.CausesValidation%2A>屬性，以`true`，並指定可驗證的控制項群組的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.ValidationGroup%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，包含要在用戶端呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Displays the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 在用戶端上顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>方法主要是由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo> object for the list, and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual check box list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo>物件清單，並呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，後者接著會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法以呈現個別的核取方塊的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> method in a custom server control so that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> always displays an image.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>自訂的伺服器控制項中的方法，讓<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>一律顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An ordinal index that specifies the location of the item in the list control.
trans-unit.target: 序數索引，指定清單控制項中項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo" /> object that represents the information used to render the item in the list.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo" /> 物件，代表用來呈現清單中項目的資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，代表要在用戶端呈現 HTML 內容的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Renders a list item in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項中呈現清單項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A> implementation for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A> method, which in turn uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method to render individual checkbox list items.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.Render%2A>實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatInfo.RenderRepeater%2A>方法，後者接著會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法以呈現個別的核取方塊的清單項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A> method for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control ignores the `itemType` and `repeatInfo` parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RenderItem%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項會忽略`itemType`和`repeatInfo`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `repeatIndex` value is used to select the checkbox list item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection, and the selected list item is rendered to the output stream.
trans-unit.target: `repeatIndex`值會用來選取的核取方塊清單項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合，並選取的清單項目呈現至輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control is rendered when the data source has no data or the control is not data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否要在資料來源沒有資料或控制項不是資料繫結時，呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is rendered when the data source has no data or the control is not data-bound; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料來源沒有資料或控制項不是資料繫結時，要呈現控制項，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns to display in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項中的資料行數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="0" />, which indicates this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="0" />，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, you can use this property to specify the number of columns that display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，您可以使用這個屬性來指定在顯示的資料行數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control displays all list items in a single column.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定這個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項會顯示單一資料行中的所有清單項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property to specify that two columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性可指定兩個資料行，會顯示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 行數設定為負值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control displays vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示要垂直或水平顯示這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatDirection" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the display direction of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用此屬性指定的顯示方向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns that are displayed is always determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 顯示資料行的數目一律由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Vertical` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Vertical`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，從上到下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有的項目會呈現填滿第一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are displayed in three columns, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性設定為`3`中的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制會顯示在三個資料行，如下列表格所示。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `RepeatDirection.Horizontal` and if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>, the first column is filled from top to bottom, then the next column, and so on until all items are rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`RepeatDirection.Horizontal`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatLayout%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.Table>，從上到下，再下一個資料行，依此類推直到所有的項目會呈現填滿第一個資料行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A> property is set to `3`, the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control are displayed in rows of three items each, as in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatColumns%2A>屬性設定為`3`的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>在下表中的三個項目每個，資料列中顯示控制項。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatDirection%2A>屬性，以指定的顯示方向是垂直。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A> property is used primarily by control developers in custom controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A>屬性主要由控制項開發人員在自訂控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>類別。

trans-unit.source: If there are no items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A> is zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何項目將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A>為零。

trans-unit.source: If there are items set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A> is the same as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有設定項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.RepeatedItemCount%2A>相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemCollection.Count%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.Items%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <see langword="table" /> element, a <see langword="ul" /> element, an <see langword="ol" /> element, or a <see langword="span" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值指定要使用 <see langword="table" /> 項目、<see langword="ul" /> 項目、<see langword="ol" /> 項目還是 <see langword="span" /> 項目來呈現清單。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the list will be rendered by using a <see langword="table" /> element, a <see langword="ul" /> element, an <see langword="ol" /> element, or a <see langword="span" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 一個值，指定要使用 <see langword="table" /> 項目、<see langword="ul" /> 項目、<see langword="ol" /> 項目還是 <see langword="span" /> 項目來呈現清單。

trans-unit.source: For information about the available options, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout> enumeration.

trans-unit.source: Two options are new as of ASP.NET 4: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>.
trans-unit.target: 兩個選項是新的 ASP.NET 4:<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.OrderedList>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RepeatLayout.UnorderedList>。

trans-unit.source: Processes posted data for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> 控制項的張貼資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果伺服器控制項的狀態因回傳而變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A> method to process posted data for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData%2A>方法來處理張貼的資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.System%23Web%23UI%23IPostBackDataHandler%23LoadPostData%2A> method is an explicit interface member implementation.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: To define a custom implementation for processing posted data for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList" /> object, override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> member.

trans-unit.source: The explicit interface implementation calls the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" /> method to process the posted data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 明確介面實作會呼叫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.LoadPostData(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)" />處理控制項的張貼的資料的方法。

trans-unit.source: Raised when posted data for a control has changed.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alignment for the check boxes within the group.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定群組中核取方塊的文字對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextAlign" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Right" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="Right" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the text associated with the check boxes appears on the left or right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定相關聯的核取方塊的文字是否顯示在左邊或右邊的核取方塊。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Right`, the text is displayed to the right of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Right`，右邊的核取方塊會顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `TextAlign.Left`, the text is displayed to the left of the check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`TextAlign.Left`，左邊的核取方塊會顯示文字。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.TextAlign%2A> property to specify that the text associated with the check boxes appears on the right side of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList.TextAlign%2A>屬性可指定相關聯的核取方塊的文字會出現在右邊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。

trans-unit.source: Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension.
trans-unit.target: 每個程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。
